text: Tom치s Edison Irribarra de la Torre (19 May 1935 - 25 December 2020) was a Chilean politician and lawyer. He was a member of the Radical Party of Chile. Irribarra was born in Quirihue, Chile. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1969 to 1973 and Mayor of Quirihue from 1992 to 1996 and again from 2008 to 2012. Irribarra died on 25 December 2020 in Quirihue at the age of 85.Falleci칩 exalcalde de Quirihue Tom치s Irribarra ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chilean politicians Category:Chilean lawyers
